Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone, just thought I'd post my answer to all your LKO debris problems! (If curse get's its act together)

Presenting: The Golden Retriever

An able spacecraft capable of grabbing, redirecting and deorbiting bits of countless debris that cloud LKO - I even found some decoupled stages with tonnes of fuel still left in them, one had all of its fuel. So its capable of orbital fuel piracy as well.

Here's another image heavy imgur album to go with it. !WARNING IMAGE HEAVY!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ypg9jt45ps91ouo/Golden%20Retriever%20Mk.1.craft?dl=0

ReconXPanzer

Edited October 28, 2014 by ReconXPanzer

PLANETEES!!!

"Keepin' Space clean from pollution!"

Nice design
